name: search_onestop_flight
doc:
def search_onestop_flight(origin: str, destination: str, date: str) -> list[tuple[tau2.domains.airline.data_model.DirectFlight, tau2.domains.airline.data_model.DirectFlight]]:
    """
Search for one-stop flights between two cities on a specific date.

Args:
    origin: The origin city airport in three letters, such as 'JFK'.
    destination: The destination city airport in three letters, such as 'LAX'.
    date: The date of the flight in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD', such as '2024-05-01'.

Returns:
    A list of pairs of DirectFlight objects.
"""

origin.description: The origin city airport in three letters, such as 'JFK'.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city airport in three letters, such as 'LAX'.
destination.title: Destination

date.description: The date of the flight in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD', such as '2024-05-01'.
date.title: Date

status.description: Indicates flight is available for booking
status.title: Status

scheduled_departure_time_est.description: Scheduled departure time in EST in the format HH:MM:SS, e.g 06:00:00
scheduled_departure_time_est.title: Scheduled Departure Time Est

scheduled_arrival_time_est.description: Scheduled arrival time in EST in the format HH:MM:SS, e.g 07:00:00
scheduled_arrival_time_est.title: Scheduled Arrival Time Est

returns.description: A list of pairs of DirectFlight objects.
returns.title: Returns
